mdRecord.dcterms:title: Satyre Menippee de la vertu du catholicon d'Espagne: Et de la tenue des Estatz de Paris
La vertu du catholicon d'Espagne
Satyre Ménippée
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Some early editions were published under title: La vertu du catholicon d'Espagne. [original]
Supposed to have been inspired by Jean Le Roy. The different pieces are by Jacques Gillot, Florent Chrestien, Nicholas Rapin, Jean Passerat and Pierre Pithou. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Capé. Unidentified armorial bookplate (crest, with one tree). From the library of the Comte de Fresne, according to handwritten note. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 398. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Capé. Unidentified armorial bookplate (crest, with one tree). From the library of the Comte de Fresne, according to handwritten note. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 398. [original]
